alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 08 at 2:05AM MST until November 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell, Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
